about_the_game:
Welcome to the twisted world of Phantom Whispers, a chilling episodic adventure that will test the limits of your sanity. Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative filled with psychological twists, eerie atmospheres, and bone-chilling encounters.

Synopsis:

In Phantom Whispers, players embark on a journey into darkness, where reality blends with nightmares, and the line between sanity and madness fades away. Each episode delves deeper into the psyche of the protagonist as they confront their deepest fears and darkest secrets. Unravel the mysteries of a sinister past while navigating through haunting environments and engaging in heart-pounding encounters with the unknown.

Key Features:

Episodic Storytelling: Experience a gripping narrative that unfolds across multiple episodes, each revealing new layers of terror and intrigue.

Psychological Horror: Delve into the depths of the human mind as you confront twisted visions, disturbing memories, and psychological torment.

Immersive Atmosphere: Explore meticulously crafted environments dripping with atmosphere, from desolate landscapes to claustrophobic interiors.

Terrifying Encounters: Encounter a cast of chilling characters and otherworldly entities that will haunt your every step, testing your nerves and resolve.

Are you ready to confront your deepest fears and unravel the mysteries of Phantom Whispers? Enter the darkness, if you dare...

Phantom Whispers - Episode 1: Intruder - Coming soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 | AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
